name: Crispy Brussel Sprouts
description: Spreaded Brussels sprouts in a single layer on a baking sheet and heated till hot and crispy.

name: Crispy Okra
description: Pods are sliced and coated in seasoned cornmeal, then fried until golden and crispy in this simple Southern classic!

name: Sauteed Spinach
description: A dish of fresh spinach (Spinacia oleracea) or frozen spinach sauteed in olive oil, often with minced garlic.

name: Roti
description: A round flatbread native to the Indian subcontinent
